name: Platformer (xXrandomryzeXx)
description:
In my 3 years of developing games I have only uploaded one project, and that is just outrageous. Due to lack of motivation I can't finish the projects I work on, but I decided to just make a game in less than a week, and then build up from there with different genres.

This is what I've made in less than a week. A few assets weren't made by me.
